title: Throw Momma from the Train (1987) (Billy Crystal, Danny DeVito)

  Larry (Billy Crystal) is a creative writing teacher with a class full of inept writers. He is divorced from a woman (Kate Mulgrew) who has taken his novel and "written" it herself and is now receiving all the glory. Larry is stewing. One of Larry&#039;s students, Owen (Danny DeVito), becomes obsessed with a murder mystery he is working on and he follows Larry around hoping for a moment of his attention. Owen has issues....his Momma (Anne Ramsey). The fun begins with a mistaken clue being taken by Owen to mean that he and Larry should criss-cross their anger and murder one another&#039;s nemesis.

  Starring: Billy Crystal, Danny DeVito, Anne Ramsey, Kate Mulgrew, Kim Greist, Rob Reiner.

  Directed by: Danny DeVito.
